name: SIMulator (nhansc18)
description:
SIMulator is a casual driving simulator game that mimics the realistic process of applying for a driver’s license (Surat Izin Mengemudi or SIM in Indonesian).

The game takes the feel of a third person, 3D, semi-realistic driving simulation game of a person driving a motor vehicle, such as a car. The user can control the car using the keys on their PC keyboards.

Control:

W,A,S,D - Movement

Space - Brake

Develop by: 

Nikolas Hans Christian - Programmer

Damario Rifando - 3D Artist

Alexander Rainer - 3D Artist
